name: centipede_damascus
text: Ray tries so hard to make the sale, he makes promises that he may not be able to keep.

name: spectre
text: Well, they ALL do that -- software sales guys sell features that don't exist and coders stay up till 4 AM creating them.

name: diggydow
text: Ray tucks his collared shirt into his thong.

name: tekende
text: I feel that that is really the most important aspect of this comic strip.

name: lennysa
text: Chubby for describing my life in 1997.  I learned, though.  I'm a network admin now.  My job is to watch things work and get paid.

name: darthemed
text: I love Philippe's smile of relief at being told he can get it without the milk part.

name: snowman
text: I also like in panel 3 how he's raising a paw as if to make a point.  "Ray, is it?  If I may interject, here, Ray..."

name: farqussus
text: More like 'Sir? Excuse me?'

name: lizjones
text: A group of otters is called a "romp".

name: spinynorman
text: That is adorable.

name: snowman
text: Unbelievably.

name: albatross
text: I just love that he has a dress shirt tucked into his thong.

name: idsyen
text: I love that no tails are visible below the thong. My theory: not a tuck, but a very precise merging of thong and shirt by means of stitchcraft.

name: internnumber1
text: It's like a pantsless Glengarry Glen Ross (Ricky Roma is a thong man, no doubt).

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "Paul McCartney: underrated bassist, overrated celebrity."

name: pwb
text: the absolute truth

name: drewvreeland
text: truly classic alt text...

name: hendetta
text: Philippe is not lactose intolerant as he has desired ice cream.

name: unfun
text: Give the kid a break.  He doesn't know what ice cream is made out of.  He had to work very hard to even be able to say "lactose intolerant".

name: bartleby
text: Perhaps Liebot told him Otters were lactose intolerant.

name: jhunter
text: and that it meant their toes would fall off if they ingested dairy products

name: greymantledwolf
text: reminds me of an awful lot of meetings...

name: f1shst1ck
text: glengarry glen ross achewood style

name: rasalghul
text: dilbert achewood style

name: snowman
text: One of my faves, ever.  I'm re-reading all of these for the first time, and it's way funnier having knowledge of what Ray's character becomes.

name: idsyen
text: The alt-text speaks the truth.

name: aninasaurusrex
text: It is my personal belief that most sentences should begin with "Hey" and end with you calling the person you're speaking with "guy".

name: tekende
text: He is not calling Roast Beef "guy." "This guy" refers to Philippe.

name: echidnaboy
text: Hey, I think she means panel 5, guy.

name: tekende
text: Ah. Yes.

name: professorriffs
text: The truth contained within the alt text made this strip a 4 instead of a 3 for me.

name: hawaiian_robot
text: It really is the truth

name: simpatico
text: Those last 3 panels are, to an extent, my life, unfortunately.

name: iovine
text: I love how much smaller the universe was back here.

name: wonelove
text: ah...business.
